name: Fileeasy Accountancy
description: Professional accountancy services for businesses and individuals in Medway, Kent. Tax returns, bookkeeping, VAT, payroll, and business advisory.

itemOffered.name: Self-Assessment Tax Returns
itemOffered.description: Personal tax return preparation and filing for sole traders, landlords, and individuals with complex income.

itemOffered.name: Limited Company Accounts
itemOffered.description: Annual statutory accounts, Corporation Tax returns, and Companies House filing for limited companies.

itemOffered.name: Bookkeeping Services
itemOffered.description: Monthly bookkeeping, bank reconciliation, and management accounts using cloud accounting software.

itemOffered.name: VAT Returns
itemOffered.description: Quarterly VAT return preparation and submission, including Making Tax Digital compliance.

itemOffered.name: Payroll Services
itemOffered.description: PAYE, RTI submissions, auto-enrolment pensions, P60s, P45s, and CIS for construction contractors.

itemOffered.name: Tax Planning & Advisory
itemOffered.description: Proactive tax planning, dividend strategy, capital allowances, and R&D tax credit claims.

itemOffered.name: Business Start-Up Support
itemOffered.description: Company formation, HMRC registrations, and initial structure advice for new businesses.

itemOffered.name: IR35 Services
itemOffered.description: IR35 status assessments, contract reviews, and CEST analysis for contractors.
